name: Quick Math IQ Test 18
description:
How good are your Arithmetic Skills? By playing this game, your Arithmetic Skills and IQ will improve by solving Quick-Fire Questions in a short period of time.

Play Quick Math IQ Test 18 with full concentration at least once a day and you will find some great changes in your confidence in tackling Arithmetic Operations. All the basic Arithmetic Operations i-e Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication and Division are included in this Quick Math IQ Test 18 game.

This game, due to its user friendly environment and beautiful graphics, is ideal for everyone. A person can improve his/her Arithmetic Skills and Responsive Speed to Quick-Fire Questions by playing this Amazing Educational game.

The difficulty of this game increases after every Five Points you Score. The further you go, the greater becomes difficulty. The more active is your Brain, the higher you Score.
